body.name: Portable Bluetooth Intelligent Anti-Lost Device,Mini Dog GPS Tracking Device, for Pets Kids Key Chain Wallet Luggage Anti-Lost Tag Alarm Reminder (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 12 mins
features: 【WIRELESS CONNECTION & RANGE】The anti-lost key finder connects to the mobile phone Bluetooth and finds the APP, which can map the location of the car key and help you find items with a range of more than 80 inches

【ANTI-LOST KEY FINDER】The smart tracker is a great gadget to alert you when you are about to forget your belongings. Pair to the app and keep it running at back-end, your phone and locator will both ring to alert you once it is disconnected, perfect for traveling to avoid losses
【LONG BATTERY LIFE & STYLISH】The smart tracker is powered by CR2032 battery with super long standby time over 10 months and can be replaced easily for long-term use
【ONE-CLICK SEARCH】Wireless Key Locator Alert Double-tap the button on the app will make your phone beep, and the key finder helps you quickly find any misplaced item without wasting time
【SERVICE AFTER SALE】If there is any problem, please feel free to contact us, we will do our best to solve the problem for you
body.description: Product features:1. This loss device is a product based on the latest Bluetooth 4.0 low-power technology. Through the use of APP software and mobile phones and other mobile devices for Bluetooth connection, it can bundle the items and valuables (such as keys, handbags, etc.) that users are easy to lose together, and realize the functions of loss reminder, two-way search, remote control photography, recording and so on (such as party photo, hand bag, etc.) Self portraits, etc.).2. The effective use distance of the device can reach 25 meters in a wide range. The button battery CR2032 can be easily purchased in Major- supermarkets. The brand original battery can work for more than half a year.3. A-p-p-l-e phone: Phone 11 and above can be used.Android Phones: Android 8.0 and above, Bluetooth 4.0 and above.4. At present, in order to increase the battery life of mainstream Android models, the system has been optimized to varying degrees, and will automatically clean up the app running in the background. When using the loss device, the app needs to be set and protected in the system to realize normal operation.5. Although the setting steps of Android phones of each brand are different, they are almost the same. First check the power saving mode of your mobile phone system, and add the loss device app to the white list or protected program to - the / loss device app from being shut down by the system and causing false alarm.
